text: wqadimna 'iilaa ma emlwh min mazahir alkhayr walbr, fajaealnah batilana mdmhla la yanfaeuhum kalhba' almnthwr, wahu ma yura fi daw' alshams min khfyf alghbar; wdhlk 'ana aleamal la yanfae fi alakhirat 'iilaa 'iidha tuafir fi sahbh: al'iiman ballh, wal'iikhlas lh, walmutabaeat larasuluh mhmd, salaa allah ealayh wslm
